nodes.text: The Keren Street Race was a racing event held in the Naboo city of Keren. The race sent the racer through and around the city, and some considered it a challenge with all the tight turns and racing over bridges that were involved in the race. At one point, Ben Quadinaros held the fastest record on the track, but it was later broken by other racers.

The Keren Street Race appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. It was added to the game with the "Publish 9.3", released on August 10, 2004.
